DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to find the adequate additional bronchial cuff volume after achievement of air-tight seal, that can achieve blood-tight seal(preventing leakage of blood through cuff) in double lumen tube
DOC.brief_title: Adequate Additional Bronchial Cuff Volume to Achieve Blood-tight Seal After Air-tight Seal in Double Lumen Tube
DOC.criteria: patients undergoing thoracic surgery under left lower decubitus position, using left sided double lumen tube patient's left main bronchus size adequate for 35Fr, 37 Fr, 39 Fr double lumen tube dislocation or great movement of double lumen tube depth
